channel.title: software development on Postmortem
channel.description: Recent content in software development on Postmortem

item.title: Make Wet Code Great Again
item.description: Almost every developer I have talked to, agree if redundancy is a smell of bad code. Most of them, then will suggest to put similiar code into one function, or class, or module.

item.title: Should We Write Tests?
item.description: One day, my friend wrote this in his timeline I guess he's tired for writing tests I know writing tests –both UT or integration tests– is boring and sometimes troublesome.

item.title: asdf -- Simple and Customizable One-for-all Version Manager
item.description: Lately, I’ve been experimenting with Elixir to create simple functional microservices. Beside the language itself, the one thing need to explore are environment tools, like version and package manager. In Elixir, at least there are 2 env managers; kiex and exenv.
